A snail named Sammy who had a magical shell that gave him super speed when he ate a special type of lettuce.
A snail named Slim who had a time-traveling shell that allowed him to go back in time and relive the race again and again.
A snail named Sparky who had a special talent for music and used his shell as a makeshift drum set during the race.
A snail named Slowpoke who had a special power that allowed him to slow down time around him.
A snail named Speedy who had a special ability to transform into a super-speedy version of himself when he got excited.
